title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Biden is the second coming of Jimmy Carter, inflation, dependence on foreign energy, weakness abroad. Australian news tells the truth about Biden and the fawning American media. Rush on how the foreign press covered Obama more honestly than the American media. Biden's focus on climate change. Rush on when Biden ranked coal, corn syrup as more dangerous than a terrorist attack. Caller remembers the Carter years. Karl Rove on rising prices. Rush on the Balanced Budget Amendment. Inflation and deficit spending will be crippling. Rush on defending the first amendment and the Constitution: We don't attack, we defend.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

The Consumer Price Index and inflation. Inflation and the CPI are higher than are being reported. North Korean defector on woke Ivy League liberals: "Even North Korea isn't this nuts. Democrat mismanagement of the economy is wreaking havoc on the real estate market. Illegal immigration and lawlessness in the streets are causing local communities to want to secede and form their own police forces. SCOTUS will have to rule on issues of federalism. Darrell Issa on Kamala Harris and the Democrats: They want open borders. Democrats go after Trump the way a dictator like Daniel Ortega would. The China threat. Unemployment payments are making it impossible for employers to fill jobs. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

It's National Lobster Day and a Cape Cod fisherman claims he was swallowed by a whale, so Jason remembers Rush's Larry the Lobster story along with a clip from Jaws. Billy Joel's Allentown should be Biden's theme song. Obamacare reform that John McCain killed would have been much better than what we have now. McCain's last minute thumbs down doomed GOP chances to keep House. Jason's simple message for Republicans to run on. EIB High Note: Seeing eye dog retires. Mitt Romney is everything that's wrong with the GOP. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
